original_title: Truth and Lies: The Crypto Couple
overview: Bitcoin. NFTs. Burner phones. A rapping tech entrepreneur. How is a hipster couple in New York allegedly connected to a massive 2016 crypto currency exchange theft? Reporting on the duo at the center of the financial mystery that rocked Wall Street, which led to $4.5 billion of bitcoin disappearing from an online banking system.
tagline: A hipster couple in New York launders money from a cryptocurrency heist
title: Truth and Lies: The Crypto Couple
